text: B&G; Foods is an American branded foods holding company. It is based in Parsippany, New Jersey. It was founded in 1996 to acquire Bloch & Guggenheimer. The company has been publicly traded since 2007 and its primary growth strategy is to acquire "orphaned" brands, those which no longer fit with their parent company's primary business. Category:American food companies Category:1996 establishments in the United States
title: B&G Foods
